string-array.name: question_One
string-array.item: What Year was Quantum Core Engine Patented?

string-array.name: question_Two
string-array.item: What Major Event Happened in the Year 2232?

string-array.name: question_Three
string-array.item: Which of the Following Ships is Designed for Exploration?

string-array.name: correct_answers
string-array.item: In the Year 2075 Roberts Space Industries introduces Quantum Core Engine Technology. This new engine allows humanity to travel to the corners of our solar system with relative ease.\n\n

In the Year 2232 Artemis Launched. First attempt to have a manned spacecraft fly (slow-burn) to the nearest star system. Captain, crew and thousands of volunteer colonists are placed in stasis for the flight. Ultimately the ship disappears.\n\n
Freelancer DUR and Carrack class ships are designed with Exploration In Mind.\n\n
